name: Shmadow (itch)
description:
Inspired by “shmups" and shadows, Shmadow is a modern twin-stick side-scroller that nods to retro arcade gameplay. Use your light to blast through your enemies, unlock new powers, and defeat bosses before the darkness extinguishes you in this thrilling adventure! Features-Action-packed gameplay with endless challenges -Build your arsenal and collect power-ups -Defeat 8 epic bosses -Controller support <3 -Thrilling 4 player co-op -Compete for high scores -Try to survive as difficulty intensifies


Steam KeyShmadow is currently on Steam ! If you purchase Shmadow on Itch you will receive a Steam Key.
